events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th, requesting to start an auto accident claim.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing initial report and damage description.
An agent with expertise in vehicle accidents was assigned to handle customer’s claim promptly.
Customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged by the company.
Request sent to customer asking for photos of the vehicle damage and police report related to the collision.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and official police report for assessment.
Investigation team began examining the submitted evidence and assessing the extent of the collision damages.
Investigation into the auto accident claim was completed with findings confirming damage and liabilities.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and associated expenses from the accident.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed appreciation for the quick resolution.
Claim was officially approved after customer's acceptance of the settlement offer for their auto accident.
Payment covering the agreed settlement was issued to the customer’s account promptly to aid vehicle repairs.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed after all payments and formalities were completed.
The documentation for the claim was archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
